items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, sexy, and excellent quality
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Elegant, sexy, and excellent quality This REORIA dress is simply beautiful. The off-shoulder design gives it a sexy yet sophisticated touch, and the stretch mesh fabric with double lining fits the body perfectly without being see-through. You can feel the quality as soon as you put it on: it’s comfortable, lightweight, and very flattering. The long sleeves make it ideal for evening events or cooler seasons, and the length is perfect for a modern, elegant look. If you’re looking for a dress that combines style, comfort, and great quality, this one is a total winner. Highly recommended! Read more
items.author: Celia Espinosa Ardila

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Comfortable, and Flattering!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. From the very first moment I wore it, this dress made me feel incredibly confident and comfortable. It fits the body perfectly without feeling tight, thanks to the stretchy double-layer fabric, giving it an elegant yet comfortable finish. The fabric is light and breathable, ideal for all-day wear, and keeps me feeling fresh without sacrificing style. I love that it reaches the ankles, giving it a sophisticated and sexy look at the same time. The color is beautiful, and the neckline is stunning, adding a subtle and elegant touch. The combination of cut, fabric, and length makes it modern and flattering. Truly a dress that combines style, comfort, and confidence. Read more
items.author: arianna jimenez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Figure Hugging Dress
items.body: I purchased this dress for a communion. It definitely accentuated my hourglass figure and was very comfortable and pretty. If you have a tummy, you might need to wear some shapewear because this dress will show everything. I deducted a star because the shoulders don’t stay down. I’d recommend sewing them down so they don’t annoy you. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tight around Arms/ Chest
items.body: Material is great, fit is a little tight, I am 5'1 and 120 pounds and got a small. The arms were really tight around my shoulders, and I can not lift up my arms in this dress, there is definitely a lack of mobility. If you don't need a whole lot of movement it is a beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: Logitech

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m in love with this dress
items.body: This dress is really elegant and looks great on. It’s perfect for a party or a nice dinner. The material feels high quality and it’s not itchy at all. It’s comfortable to wear and fits nicely. I definitely recommend it. Read more
items.author: Ana Rodriguez

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived used, stained and smells awful
items.body: Cute dress, but was very disappointed to realize this dress had been worn and returned. There are multiple stains and the dress has terrible odor to it. I ordered this for family pictures and I’m really disappointed. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Absolutely stunning, and a very comfortable dress. I’m 5’1, 110 pounds & this fits to a TEA! It fits the perfect areas, and this can be worn casual or to an elegant outing. The fabric is very soft and the quality is 10/10. Very very beautiful! Read more
items.author: Keala Ho

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits petite women
items.body: I am 4’11 and weigh 100 lbs the size small fit perfectly. I didn’t need to hem the dress because with my heels the dress didn’t need it. I originally purchased this dress as a backup and didn’t think I would like it or end up using it. I was expecting the dress to look a little cheap but was surprised to see how well its made and how elegant it looked. The dress is stretchy but the dress hugs your body nice and the mesh holds up well, no rips or holes considering I have long stiletto nails. I danced all night in this dress and have no complains about it. Compared to all the other dresses that I had also purchased from a different brand (not from Amazon) all ranging from ($150-$200) I ended up wearing this one and saved myself the tailoring fee. Read more
items.author: CeceSeydoux

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Neon Rose Red, Khaki, Deep Blue, Burgundy, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
